query.statement: SELECT TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE, COMMUNITY_ID, POST_ID FROM MIP_BOARD <!--Velocity-Support-findBoardList-START--> #if ($SEARCH_CONDITION.length()>0 && "0" == $SEARCH_CONDITION) WHERE TITLE like '%' || :SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%' #elseif ($SEARCH_CONDITION.length()>0 && "1" == $SEARCH_CONDITION) WHERE REG_ID like '%' || :SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%' #end <!--Velocity-Support-findBoardList-END--> ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO MIP_BOARD (TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE, COMMUNITY_ID, POST_ID) VALUES (:TITLE, :CONTENTS, :REG_ID, sysdate, :COMMUNITY_ID, 'POST-'|| NEXT VALUE FOR POST_ID_SEQ)
UPDATE MIP_BOARD SET TITLE = :TITLE, CONTENTS = :CONTENTS, REG_ID =:REG_ID, COMMUNITY_ID = :COMMUNITY_ID WHERE POST_ID = :POST_ID
SELECT TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE, COMMUNITY_ID, POST_ID FROM MIP_BOARD WHERE POST_ID = :POST_ID
